values: chop down [phrasal verb]chop (something) down or chop down (something): to cut (a tree, bush, etc.) at the bottom so that it falls to the ground砍倒，伐倒（树木、灌木等）He chopped the tree dow
n.他把这棵树砍倒了。She chopped down some thick grape vines.她砍掉一些粗大的葡萄藤。 chop
